measured_by: 6-point truth rating scale (Definitely False to Definitely True)
justification: “Participants made their truth ratings in the test phase on a 6-point scale from ‘Definitely false’ to ‘Definitely true’.”
“…participants…were then presented with the expanded 7 question version of the Cognitive Reflection Test (CRT, Frederick, 2005; Toplak, West, & Stanovich, 2014).”
